activities.title: High-Speed SerDes Transmitter
activities.subtitle: Initial Eye Diagram Simulation
activities.description: This project focuses on the architecture of a 56Gbps PAM4 transmitter. In this phase, I am verifying the equalization logic using Cadence Virtuoso. The video below demonstrates the adaptive equalizer convergence and the resulting eye opening after channel loss.

activities.title: Mixed-Signal Layout Automation
activities.subtitle: Scripting in SKILL & Python
activities.description: An ongoing effort to automate the layout generation for differential pairs to minimize parasitic mismatch. This tool takes a netlist as input and automatically places devices with common-centroid matching. The demo shows the script execution and DRC check.

ongoing_tasks.title: Low-Power ADC Design
ongoing_tasks.heading: 12-bit SAR ADC Optimization
ongoing_tasks.description: Working on optimizing power consumption for a 12-bit SAR ADC targeting IoT applications. Currently focusing on comparator design and capacitor DAC sizing.

ongoing_tasks.title: Clock Distribution Network
ongoing_tasks.heading: Multi-GHz Clock Tree Synthesis
ongoing_tasks.description: Designing a low-jitter clock distribution network for a high-speed SoC. Investigating different buffer topologies and clock tree architectures.
